snippet: As government seeks ways to save cash by outsourcing services, it might keep in mind that private efforts need clear goals and close monitoring, lest they veer in unintended directions.
abstract: Eduardo Porter Economic Scene column says that as government seeks ways to save cash by outsourcing services, it might be wise to keep in mind that private efforts need clear goals and close monitoring, lest they veer in unintended directions.

headline.main: When Public Outperforms Private in Services
headline.print_headline: When Public Outperforms Private In Services

snippet: The retailer’s 10-year commitment, totaling $50 billion, comes as it is under pressure over its overseas sourcing following a deadly fire in November in Bangladesh.
abstract: Walmart announces that it will increase sourcing of American-made products by $50 billion over the next 10 years; says it will buy more goods already produced in the United States, as well as help vendors return production that has moved overseas; announcement comes as the retailer is under pressure over its overseas sourcing due to a deadly fire in Bangladesh.

headline.main: Walmart Plans to Buy American More Often
headline.print_headline: Walmart Plans to Buy American More Often

snippet: The Surface tablet has been on the market for nearly three months, and analysts say it has not done well.
abstract: The Surface tablet has been on the market for nearly three months, and analysts say it has not done well.

headline.main: How Is Microsoft's Surface Tablet Doing?

snippet: An exhibit of stylized food photography, a fund-raiser for an organization that teaches world cuisines and the flavor of ales from centuries past.
A new book traces the history of words having to do with food and drink.
abstract: Book The Diner’s Dictionary: Word Origins of Food & Drink by John Ayto traces history of words having to do with food and drink.

headline.main: Learn How Calipash Differs From Calipee
headline.print_headline: Learn How Calipash Differs From Calipee

snippet: When Nissan designed its stand for this year's Detroit auto show, one of the things it considered was how the stand would smell.
abstract: When Nissan designed its stand for this year's Detroit auto show, one of the things it considered was how the stand would smell.

headline.main: For Nissan, a Designer  Fragrance to Float Among Its Cars at the Auto Show

snippet: Many stocks rose after the federal report on December sales came in stronger that predicted, though Apple declined again, losing 3.2 percent on Tuesday.
abstract: Wall Street edges higher after retail data comes in stronger than projected, although tech heavyweight Apple drags on the market for a third day.

snippet: OKCupid, a popular dating site, wants to set up members on blind dates while giving them little information to go on about the other person — not even a full photograph.
abstract: OKCupid, a popular dating site, wants to set up members on blind dates while giving them little information to go on about the other person — not even a full photograph.

headline.main: OkCupid Wants to Send Members on a 'Crazy Blind Date'
headline.print_headline: The Crazy Side Of a Dating App

snippet: Improving its ability to find treasure amid junk offers Facebook a chance to topple Google from the throne as the king of search.
abstract: Analysts say Facebook, which has had stock rally over increased advertising efforts, needs to improve its search ability to challenge Google; it has expanded its search engineer staff and rolled out new features to help users discover information on site.

headline.main: Fortunes of Facebook May Hinge on Searches
headline.print_headline: Fortunes Of Facebook May Hinge On Searches

snippet: Analysts say Apple must decide whether to keep catering to the high end of the market or offer something cheaper.
abstract: Analysts say Apple must decide whether to keep catering to high end of the phone market with its iPhone, reaping fat profits from relatively fewer sales, or offer something cheaper to compete with lower-cost alternatives like Samsung's phones; stock price is down 30 percent since Sept 2012.

headline.main: Worry Over Sales Spurs Talk of Cheaper iPhones
headline.print_headline: Worry Over Sales Spurs Talk of Cheaper iPhones
